title: How to Download and Use Zelda Classic

steps.headline: Download ZC.
steps.description: Once it is downloaded, double left click on ZQuest-W.

steps.headline: Experiment with all + - page down (Page Down) [pg dn] {Pg Dn} Page Up [pg up] {Pg Up} (Page Up) etc.
Left click on the tiles and make some tiles.
Be sure to add a stairs tile.
steps.description: Go to Edit Strings and make some strings.

steps.headline: G Ama guy/girl/etc.
steps.description: desired and also S to be able to choose string and choose string.

steps.headline: Save Quest as experiment quest.qst and then open up zelda-w, but be sure ZQuest-W is closed though.
Play, and when done, press F8 and then Enter or Return or both twice.

Have fun making quests and do a search engine (Google or Yahoo or Bing or Ask or blekko as some examples) of quests such as A Hero Without A Name Zelda Classic Quest so you can download and play other quests.

text: Download ZC. Once it is downloaded, double left click on ZQuest-W. Experiment with all + - page down (Page Down) [pg dn] {Pg Dn} Page Up [pg up] {Pg Up} (Page Up) etc. buttons. Left click on the tiles and make some tiles.  Be sure to add a stairs tile. Go to Edit Strings and make some strings. G Ama guy/girl/etc. desired and also S to be able to choose string and choose string. Save Quest as experiment quest.qst and then open up zelda-w, but be sure ZQuest-W is closed though.  Load experiment quest.qst.  Play, and when done, press F8 and then Enter or Return or both twice.  Experiment with the tiles.  Have fun making quests and do a search engine (Google or Yahoo or Bing or Ask or blekko as some examples) of quests such as A Hero Without A Name Zelda Classic Quest so you can download and play other quests.
